mapper.select: select count(*) from user join membership on user.user_id = membership.user_id

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tot.* from (select user.user_name,user.user_email,user.user_totaddress,user.user_phone,membership.mem_grade,membership.mem_start_date from user join membership on user.user_id = membership.user_id order by user.user_id desc, membership.mem_start_date asc) tot, (select @rownum:=0) temp) sub where rnum between #{startrow} and #{startrow}+9
